backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor implementing authentication, access control, label configs, printers, prefix counters, and print/error logging with session-based password auth.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping specific frontend files to feature requirements for scan/print reliability and strict prefix validation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing their purpose, UI behavior, and functional responsibilities.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide detailing prerequisites, dfx setup, production deployment steps, and troubleshooting for IC canisters.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining color tokens and dark mode styles plus global border/background settings.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with authentication gate, tab navigation, wake‑lock indicator, and printer/protocol context providers.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Touch‑optimized login component with backend health checks, auto‑retry, detailed error reporting, and authenticate flow.
frontend/src/contexts/PrintProtocolConte: React context for selecting and storing the active print protocol (CPCL/ZPL/ESC‑POS).
Provides a React context for managing WebUSB printer connections, handling device selection, interface claiming, errors, and sending CPCL commands.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Builds and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing authentication state, login, logout, and persisted identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend operations like authentication, printers, label configs, print records, and user profiles using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Provides a hook to request and maintain a screen wake lock, handle release events, and reacquire on visibility changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theme tokens, dark mode variables, touch optimizations, and tablet-specific tab sizing.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/Devices.tsx: Manages USB printer connection, protocol selection, and sending a CPCL test print via WebUSB.
frontend/src/pages/Diagnostics.tsx: Displays print history and error counts and allows exporting diagnostic data to CSV.
frontend/src/pages/LabelSettings.tsx: Provides a UI for editing label layout settings, prefixes, and title mappings with live preview and saving to backend.
frontend/src/pages/ScanPrint.tsx: Implements two-scan validation workflow, error handling, and label printing using USB printers and stored configs.
frontend/src/types/webusb.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for WebUSB device, configuration, interfaces, endpoints, and transfer operations.
frontend/src/utils/cpclTemplates.ts: Provides CPCL label generation utilities, including test prints and dual-serial label rendering using the layout model.
frontend/src/utils/icErrors.ts: Classifies Internet Computer-related errors and produces user-friendly error messages.
frontend/src/utils/labelLayoutModel.ts: Defines label layout constants and computes precise dual-serial label layouts ensuring consistent preview and CPCL output.
Renders dual‑serial label previews on a canvas using Code128 encoding and the unified layout model.
frontend/src/utils/scannerOnlyInput.ts: Detects barcode‑scanner input by timing keystrokes and normalizing scanned values while blocking paste and manual typing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with support for hash‑based routing and session storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color tokens, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project’s architecture, features, and issues for a barcode scanning and label printing web app backed by an Internet Computer canister.
